actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the provisions of law providing compensation for work injuries suffered by Federal employees with respect to the entitlement of firefighters in certain cases.

summary.text: Provides compensation for work injuries suffered by Federal employees, whose duties are primarily to perform work directly connected with the control and extinguishment of fires or the use of firefighting apparatus and equipment, and who suffer disability or death as a result of respiratory, cardiac, or cardiovascular disease. (Adds 5 U.S.C. 8102c)

titles.title: A bill to amend the provisions of law providing compensation for work injuries suffered by Federal employees with respect to the entitlement of firefighters in certain cases.
